title: Part A – getNextLoc (3 points)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ indicates a point earned.

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Guards against out-of-bounds access of grid elements

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to access any element of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ in this part, as long as the guard prevents the returned Location MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGmbGaae4BaiaabogacaqGHbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaaaa@38C3@ from being out of bounds

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • return a Location MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGmbGaae4BaiaabogacaqGHbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaaaa@38C3@ that would be out of bounds

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Accesses both an element of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ to the right and an element of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ below row MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGYbGaae4BaiaabEhaaaa@3453@ and col MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGJbGaae4BaiaabYgaaaa@3439@

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • access elements of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ out of bounds

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to access elements of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ correctly

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Returns Location MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGmbGaae4BaiaabogacaqGHbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaaaa@38C3@ of appropriate grid element (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • incorrectly guard against out-of-bounds access of grid elements

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • call the Location MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGmbGaae4BaiaabogacaqGHbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaaaa@38C3@ constructor incorrectly

  • fail to consider all four cases

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: Total number of points earned is equal to 0.
Total number of points earned is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned is equal to 3.

title: Part B – sumPath (6 points)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. +1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ indicates a point earned.

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.C] Initializes and increases variable to store sum of grid values

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to initialize a local variable in a recursive solution, as long as an element of the grid is added to the recursive call

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • initialize the variable to something other than 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaaIWaaaaa@322C@ or an element of grid

  • increment the sum variable using something other than an element of grid

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Determines the path based on successive calls to getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ while current position is not the bottom-right position of grid (no bounds errors) (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • fail to access an element of grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@

  • call getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ incorrectly

  • access row/column of next location incorrectly

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to call getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@

  • fail to use row/column derived from getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ return value in subsequent calls

  • stop loop early (omit required path locations) or late (violate getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ precondition) due to incorrect boundary condition

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.A] Calls getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ (in the context of a loop)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • call getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ within an incorrect loop

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • call getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ on the class or on an object other than this MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqG0bGaaeiAaiaabMgacaqGZbaaaa@3536@ (use of this MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqG0bGaaeiAaiaabMgacaqGZbaaaa@3536@ is optional)

  • fail to call getNextLoc MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A8D@ with two int MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGPbGaaeOBaiaabshaaaa@3446@ arguments

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.A] Calls getRow MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGsbGaae4BaiaabEhaaaa@36FC@ and getCol MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeyzaiaabshacaqGdbGaae4BaiaabYgaaaa@36E2@ on a Location MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGmbGaae4BaiaabogacaqGHbGaaeiDaiaabMgacaqGVbGaaeOBaaaa@38C3@ object

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • call either method incorrectly

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Accesses a grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ element at positions derived from the call to the next location method

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • access an incorrect grid MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGNbGaaeOCaiaabMgacaqGKbaaaa@3524@ element

  • only access the grid at row MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGYbGaae4BaiaabEhaaaa@3453@ and col MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8vrps0lbbf9q8GipeeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeaabaqaaeaadaaakeaacaqGJbGaae4BaiaabYgaaaa@3439@ , if the solution is recursive and the parameters of the recursive call are derived from a call to the next location method

+1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHRaWkcaaIXaaaaa@3A99@ [Skill 3.E] Computes sum of values along path (algorithm)

Responses can still earn the point even if they

  • stop loop early or late due to incorrect boundary condition

  • fail to return the computed sum (return not assessed in this part)

Responses will not earn the point if they

  • fail to include the first or last visited location in the sum

Canonical Solution:
descriptions: Total number of points earned is equal to 0.
Total number of points earned is equal to 1.
Total number of points earned is equal to 2.
Total number of points earned is equal to 3.
Total number of points earned is equal to 4.
Total number of points earned is equal to 5.
Total number of points earned is equal to 6.
